These are the packages needed for making a shiny app with the functions we want

install tidyverse
```
install.packages("tidyverse")
```

install htmlwidgets
```
install.packages("htmlwidgets")
```

install shiny
```
install.packages("shiny")
```

install bslib
```
install.packages("bslib")
```

install
```
install.packages("ggplot2")
```

load packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(htmlwidgets)
library(shiny)
library(bslib)
library(ggplot2)
```
